question: More and more people are working from home rather than at the workforce. Some people say this will bring benefits to the workers and their families, but others think it will bring stress to the home. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: Nowadays, we are facing the covid-19 pandemic in the world. Because of the coronavirus, pandemic every country also implemented a strict lockdown, additionally it caused the shutdown of all the companies, schools, institutions and research centres. Because of ,this more and more people are allowed to work from home rather than in the workforce. In this contest some people get benefits, but another hand, some feel stressed. In this essay, I will discuss both these views and give my own opinion on the matter. Firstly, I will explore the way this innovation has changed the way human beings earn money and secondly, I will share the drawbacks of this trend.

To begin with, online jobs many companies and research institutions allow workers to the online workforce. For ,example people can work from anywhere at any time. At the moment many new young age employees pursue additional courses online. Like they are learning other activities and teaching the students through online classes. It has allowed employees to do jobs at any time or watch television and chill with friends. As a result, a person feels comfortable and becomes more concentrated on his responsibilities.

Controversy, when we are not in the workforce employees some don’t prefer to work from home. For instance, we are surrounded by our family and think prevent from working. So that postpone work, it might be facing problems like mental and families issue.

In conclusion, however arguments above in support of each opinion, we can see there are many advantages and disadvantages of being employed from home and I want to say that it must be decided by everybody which way of employment to choose.
